General.Name: Shining Building Business Co Ltd
General.Description: Shining Building Business Co. Ltd. engages in building, rental, and sale of public housing in Taiwan and Mainland China. The company operates in Building Unit, Construction Unit, and Other Units segments. It is also involved in the development of commercial buildings and other real estate properties; civil engineering business; hotel construction; and general investment activities. The company was founded in 1980 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.
